load.parsenotes: Unable to parse xml notepad. It will be overwritten.
load.noteswrong: Document of the wrong type. It will be overwritten.
load.manynotes: Too many notes - Last nodes were ignored.
load.notenode: Incorrect node type - could not copy.
load.savenotes: Unable to write notes to file %s
load.exceednotes: Tried to exceed notepad buffer! Ignored.

misc.nasty: Something nasty happened while trying to process:
misc.corrupt: Object seems to be corrupted. Skipping the object. Warning: This might cause further problems.
misc.multimat: Two or more materials with the same texture name!
misc.resolve: Can't resolve server address. Perhaps you are not connected to the Internet or your DNS server is down!
misc.redefine: You need to update your character, due to the new models! Go on the New Character screen, type your existing username and password, update your character, then press Done. *YOUR STATS AND ITEMS WILL NOT BE AFFECTED*
misc.newver: There is a new version of the client, please update it
misc.notsup: This version is no longer supported, please update!
misc.timer_lag: The %s timer was lagging severely behind or had stopped, restarted it
misc.notabs: You cannot disable tabbed windows with video mode %d, forcing them
misc.nonomap: Fatal error: Couldn't load map ./maps/nomap.elm. Fix your maps.
misc.nobmpmap: There is no map for this place.
misc.badnode: There is something wrong with one of a node's fields.
misc.badroot: The root node in %s was incorrect.
misc.undefnode: Found an unexpected node type while parsing %s (%s).
misc.use_builtin_chans: Could not load a channel list from file. Using a limited built-in set instead.
misc.use_eng_chans: Could not load a channel list for language code %s. Using the english set instead.

particles.version: Particle file %s version (%i) doesn't match file reader version (%i)!
particles.overrun: Particle file %s tries to define %i particles, when %i is the maximum!
particles.pos: Particle file %s contained strange position/constraint values. Tried to fix.

snd.tooslow: Sorry, too slow to play music...
snd.intern: Internal logic fault (bug or heap/stack corruption)
snd.enomusic: This client was built without music support

video.nostencil: Video mode %s with a stencil buffer is not available Trying this mode without a stencil buffer...
video.safemode: Video mode %s without a stencil buffer is not available Trying the safemode (640x480x32) Full Screen (no stencil)
video.nohwstencil: Couldn't find a hardware accelerated stencil buffer. Shadows are not available.
video.depth: Hint: Try a 32 BPP resolution (if you are under XWindows, set your screen display to 24 or 32 bpp).
video.swstencil: Hmm... This mode seems to fall back in software 'acceleration'. Trying to disable the stencil buffer.
video.last_try: Hmm... No luck without a stencil buffer either... Let's try one more thing...
video.swmode: Damn, it seems that you are out of luck, we are in the software mode now, so the game will be veeeeery slow. If you DO have a 3D accelerated card, try to update your OpenGl drivers...
video.extnotfound: Couldn't find the %s extension, not using it...
video.multitex: Couldn't find the GL_ARB_multitexture extension, giving up clouds shadows, and texture detail...
video.toobigshadowmap: Shadow map size not supported! Shadow map size reduced to %d!
video.invalid: Stop playing with the configuration file and select valid modes!

rules.proceed: Read the rules and you can play in %dsec
rules.ready: Read all rules (scroll to the bottom) and click on "I Accept" to play!
rules.read: An error occured while reading the rules
rules.parse: An error occored while parsing the rules
rules.notfound: The rules.xml file was not found. You will have to redownload your game.
